titleStmt.title: JRC-ACQUIS 41999D0010 English
The Schengen acquis - Decision of the Executive Committee of 28 April 1999 on the illegal trade in firearms (SCH/Com-ex (99) 10)

notesStmt.note: Only European Community legislation printed in the paper edition of the Official Journal of the European Union is deemed authentic.

body.head: The Schengen acquis - Decision of the Executive Committee of 28 April 1999 on the illegal trade in firearms (SCH/Com-ex (99) 10)
body.p: on the illegal trade in firearms
Having regard to Article 132 of the Convention implementing the Schengen Agreement,
Having regard to Article 9 of the abovementioned Convention,

Henceforth, the Contracting Parties shall submit each year by 31 July their national annual data for the preceding year on illegal trade in firearms, on the basis of the joint table for compiling statistics annexed to document SCH/I-ar (98) 32.
